Counsel, 
We have an additional discovery production ready to send to you. Attached please find the accompanying cover letter. In 
addition, a supplemental production of testifying witness and non-testifying witness material and exhibits are also ready 
to send to you. Attached please find the accompanying cover letter and indices. 
The production will be made via USAfx. We will send one of the hard drives you provided to the MDC for Ms. Maxwell. 
Thanks, 
Assistant  tUUniited States Attorney
